2. Non-British Dependants Visas

If you are British, have entitlement to Right of Abode or you qualify for a UK ancestry visa (via British parent or grandparent), and have a non-British spouse, partner, or children under the age of 18, who wish to accompany you to the UK, they may qualify for entry as dependants via settlement visa (currently dependent on minimum income or savings). Visas are submitted through the Harare UK Visa Application Centre (below). British Nationals living in the EAA may be able to bring dependents into the UK with a family permit.
